channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 -- BIG-IP AFM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 -- BIG-IP AFM

item.title: CVE-2019-6672|2024-08-04T20:31:04.038Z -- f5 -- big-ip%20afm
item.description: On BIG-IP AFM 15.0.0-15.0.1, 14.0.0-14.1.2, and 13.1.0-13.1.3.1, when bad-actor detection is configured on a wildcard virtual server on platforms with hardware-based sPVA, the performance of the BIG-IP AFM system is degraded.
